channel.title: Somebody please tell me how to make my own server plzzzzzzzz!@!@@!
channel.description:
instead of sending me links can u plz explain to me how the hell to make a server?!?!? this is litterally driving me crazy!@@!@ and also.... i hav moparscape v 3.1, i keep clicking start server but it wont work!@ and 1 more thing how do i get monsters to hav more hp??? ive already gotten into the npc.cfg file and changed the numbers wat i wana no is how i make them actually hav that amount of hp????
somebdy with experience please answer!! :mad: :confused: :confused: :eek:[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 05:55:24 AM[/size][hr]cmon you guys answered everybody elses probs...

item.title: Somebody please tell me how to make my own server plzzzzzzzz!@!@@!
item.dc:creator: @imickhunt imickhunt
item.description:
@imickhunt wrote:

instead of sending me links can u plz explain to me how the hell to make a server?!?!? this is litterally driving me crazy!@@!@ and also.... i hav moparscape v 3.1, i keep clicking start server but it wont work!@ and 1 more thing how do i get monsters to hav more hp??? ive already gotten into the npc.cfg file and changed the numbers wat i wana no is how i make them actually hav that amount of hp????

somebdy with experience please answer!!

People are sending you links to help. you need to compile the server before the changes will take effect. Before playing it you’ll probally get errors then you will have to change alot of the values you edited.

if your unhappy with the source you have (the one that comes with moparscape) then download a new one.

Read full topic
